"CreatedOn" from "dbo"."schReplayoncomment" "schReplayoncomment" left join "dbo"."schComments" "schComment" on "schReplayoncomment"."schCommentId" = "schComment"."schCommentId" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "schCommentbranch" on "schComment"."branch" = "schCommentbranch"."branch" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "schCommentbranchsgm" on "schCommentbranch"."sgm" = "schCommentbranchsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "schCommentbranchGender" on "schCommentbranch"."Genderid" = "schCommentbranchGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."schStage" "schCommentbranchstage" on "schCommentGrade"."acdcode" = "schCommentGradeacd"."Code" left join "dbo"."schStage" "schCommentGradeStage" on "schCommentGrade"."StageCode" = "schCommentGradeStage"."Code" left join "schCommentStudentarea"."Code" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "schCommentStudentbranch" on "schCommentStudent"."branch" = "schCommentStudentbranch"."branch" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "schCommentStudentCntry_" on "schCommentStudent"."Cntry_No" = "schCommentStudentCntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "schCommentStudentGender" on "schCommentStudent"."Genderid" = "schCommentStudentGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "schCommentStudentReligion" on "schCommentStudent"."Religion" = "schCommentStudentReligion"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyState" "schCommentStudentstate" on "schCommentStudent"."state" = "schCommentStudentstate"."State" left join "dbo"."reg_other_schools" "schCommentStudentid" on "schCommentStudent"."id" = "schCommentStudentid"."id" left join "dbo"."schAcademicyear" "schCommentStudentacd" on "schCommentStudent"."acdcode" = "schCommentStudentacd"."Code" left join "dbo"."schClassConfig" "schCommentStudentClass" on "schCommentStudent"."Class" = "schCommentStudentClass"."classcode" left join "dbo"."Schclasskindlist" "schCommentStudentSchclasskind" on "schCommentStudent"."Schclasskindid" = "schCommentStudentSchclasskind"."Schclasskindid" left join "dbo"."schFather" "schCommentStudentFather" on "schCommentStudent"."FatherCode" = "schCommentStudentFather"."FatherCode" left join "dbo"."schGrade" "schCommentStudentGrade" on "schCommentStudent"."GradeCode" = "schCommentStudentGrade"."GradeCode" left join "dbo"."schMother" "schCommentStudentMother" on "schCommentStudent"."MotherCode" = "schCommentStudentMother"."MotherCode" left join "dbo"."schStage" "schCommentStudentStage" on "schCommentStudent"."Stage" = "schCommentStudentStage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schstatus" "schCommentStudentschstatus_" on "schCommentStudent"."schstatus_code" = "schCommentStudentschstatus_"."schstatus_code" left join "dbo"."schstclasskinddmg" "schCommentStudentschstclasskinddmg" on "schCommentStudent"."schstclasskinddmgid" = "schCommentStudentschstclasskinddmg"."schstclasskinddmgid" left join on "schCommentStudent"."schsthlthcaseid" = "schCommentStudentschsthlthcase"."schsthlthcaseid" left join "dbo"."Schstudentsefa" "schCommentStudentstudentsefa" on "schCommentStudent"."studentsefa" = "schCommentStudentstudentsefa"."studentsefaid" left join "dbo"."schstudenttyp" "schCommentStudentschstudenttyp" on "schCommentStudent"."schstudenttypid" =
